name: BondManager
description: BondManager. This contract is, for now, a stub of the "real" BondManager that does nothing but allow the "OVM_Proposer" to submit state root batches. Runtime target: EVM.

functionDecorators.name: isCollateralized
functionDecorators.description: Checks whether a given address is properly collateralized and can perform actions within the system.

returnDecorators.description: true if the address is properly collateralized, false otherwise.

functionDecorators.name: resolve
functionDecorators.description: Resolves the address associated with a given name.

parameterDecorators.name: _name
parameterDecorators.description: Name to resolve an address for.

returnDecorators.description: Address associated with the given name.
